co.cask.cdap.api.workflow
Interface WorkflowContext

public interface WorkflowContext

Represents the runtime context of a WorkflowAction.

getLogicalStartTime

long getLogicalStartTime()

getMapReduceRunner

Callable<MapReduceContext> getMapReduceRunner(String name)
Returns a Callable that launches the MapReduce job of the specified name when the Callable.call() method is called. When the MapReduce job completes, the Callable returns the MapReduceContext of the job or null if no such context exists. An Exception is thrown from the Callable.call() method if the MapReduce job fails.

Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if no MapReduce job with the specified name is defined in the workflow.

getRuntimeArguments

Map<String,String> getRuntimeArguments()
Returns:
A map of the argument's key and value.
